title: WISH THERE WAS A WAY TO REPLY TO MESSAGES VIA APPLE WATCH
text:
Listen I love Snapchat. It’s probably my most used app. I have multiple group chats with friends, family and coworkers. My only gripe is when I get a notification on my Apple Watch all I can do is click on the notification. It might be wishful thinking or just entitlement, but I really wish there was a way for me to open the chat and reply to text chats. I could understand not adding the actual photo and video portion, but just the text chats would be amazing and really improve my personal experience with the app. 

I don’t know if anyone else in the world out there feels the same way but if you do, please leave a similar review so hopefully they can implement something along these lines. 

Sincerely, Snapchat user

title: Waste of time.
text:
Snapchat used to be a great and simple app to use.
But now they’re trying to do too much & are attempting to compete with tiktok for some reason. Plus it tries to compete with all the other companies who are attempting to make their own AI’s. I’d rate snapchat higher if the Snapchat AI wasn’t at the top of my chats 24/7. The Ai is the worst thing to have ever been added to the app. At least all the other bells and whistles can be easily ignored, but the AI is constantly there. It’s not even a good AI chat bot either.
To make it worse, Snapchat doesn’t let you move it or get rid of it unless you buy their useless subscription “Snapchat +”
Snapchat has been a part of my life since early highschool & I have an ongoing streak with so many people, but I’ve considered deleting the app because of the AI bot constantly being there. I want my most recent snap being at the top of my chat like it’s always been. Not the second one down.

title: Disappointing
text: I walked out of school and checked my phone and went straight to snapchat. I was logged out, but sometimes it does that so i didn’t think anything of it. until it gave me a message saying “Due to repeated failed attempts or other unusual activity, your access to Snapchat is temporarily disabled.” I was very confused and concerned because i wasn’t even on the app that day, and hadn’t logged in about 2 weeks. it’s probably been about a year now and it’s still staying that. i have “unlocked” my account multiple times and yet here i am, with no luck with anything. It got to the pointe where i logged into the snapchat website and deactivated my account in hopes if i made a completely new account, it would start working again. I honestly have no idea what happened that day, i’m pretty sure i was hacked and no matter how many times i click the “unlock” button, it won’t. i’m very disappointed.

title: My Ai
text: I have had snapchat for almost 10 years now and this is the first time I am truly considering deleting it. I have purposely not updated my snapchat for months to avoid the creepy ai “friend” that it has. I accidentally did today not thinking and there is ZERO way to remove it. If you would like you can pay $12 a month just so it doesn’t show at the top of you chat feed. But even $144 a year isn’t enough for snapchat to allow users to have the privacy they would like without “my ai.” I truly believe there are no good intentions with this not being able to remove it. While disappointing to not have access to my account anymore it has to be better than them finding an excuse to monitor what we do and say and then lie about it saying that it doesn’t. If it didn’t and there were truly good intentions we would be able to remove it. Very upsetting and a bad move for snapchat.

title: Review for parents
text: Although Snapchat is an amazing app when it comes down to communicating, it completely lost me with one thing. The spotlight and discovery. There are wayyy too many inappropriate videos and images being shown. My parents didn’t let me keep the app because of this reason after they were looking through all the features. I was planning on buying Snapchat plus as well but now, they’ve lost a customer. I’m guessing I’m not the only one for this to happen to. I’m sure a few simple fixes or restrictions, maybe even a setting to block these features altogether would have gained them at least 100,000 maybe even more users whose parents are worried about what their children are seeing. Overall, the app is good but it is still inappropriate in some areas.

title: Glitchy
text: I liked this app a lot, as it was my main way to contact my friends, but lately, my snap has automatically been unadding people, it unadded one of my BEST FRIENDS and we were both under the impression that the other unadded the other until I reached out to ask why. I’m very frustrated. I love the filters, and the simplicity of the app, but now it’s been unadding my favorite people and that’s just something that NEEDS to be fixed immediately. I tried readding the accounts but you wanna know what happened? The account didn’t exist at all, but then my backup account could add them and that’s how we stayed on snap. I’m very disappointed in Snap, it’s supposed to be a nice, fun, easy way to stay in touch with people, but lately with all its new updates, it’s just becoming more and more of a pain to use.

title: Got Worse Over Time
text: This app has been great since i got it in 2014 i loved the simplicity and easy communication. I think stories were a good way to have something be there and you see it or you don’t. But over time the quality of the app worsened. And recently i got randomly locked out of my account. I wish there was a better security system to gain access considering they have more money from ads. and premium features.

title: wouldn’t recommend Snapchat to anyone due to prior account deletion and no response since.
text: For some reason it won’t let me type in the review box. I used to love Snapchat and be an avid fan of it but over the last two years it’s been a bit of a falling out. I had an original account with over 500 friends and family. I linked my OF when I had one for a couple months not knowing that was against terms. Had I known I never would have done it. I was immediately reported by a follower and my 5+ year old account was deleted in Nov’20. I contacted Snapchat numerous times to try to reason with them with multiple generic automatic responses but absolutely no help, “just be patient.” After a year I gave up. I lost all my photos and memories on there of my 10 year old Dane that passed in April ‘20. It was honestly devastating. I’d love to have my original account but now wouldn’t recommend anyone to use Snapchat.

title: Great but a bit annoying

Every three minutes I'm watching a story, a stupid ad will always pop up that I can't skip for no reason at all. otherwise, pretty good app for texting and keeping in touch with friends!

title: Customer Service is a JOKE
text: There is NO customer service. You cannot get ahold of anybody, and that poses a VARIETY of problems. Constantly getting porn ads? Report them if you’d like, but they are bots, and there are MILLIONS of those accounts. In fact, because there are so many, if only a few people just spam report a legitimate account, it gets banned as well. Get falsely banned? Well, too bad there’s nobody to talk to about becoming unbanned! Hope you don’t have years of photos stored on the app. “Great” new “My” AI feature. It’s now pinned to the top of your chats. And you can’t move it anymore. That’s now a paid feature of Snapchat+, a garbage addition that makes once free content locked behind a paywall. Oh, also don’t add too many friends too fast. Snapchat will ban you. And again, no unbans. And pray that you don’t do any of the other hundred harmless things that can get you randomly permanently banned too. Bad app, horribly company.

title: Very negative trends
text:
Developers clearly no longer care about user interests. This is evidenced by the introduction of the Snapchat AI “friend”, which sits at the top of the chats list and is unremoveable. Not only that but they are actively removing ways to delete this friend from your list. This is majorly annoying for someone who has no interest spending his free time giving snapchat more data to farm.

I have other complaints as well, such as the fact that the memories tab, which used to only show notifications when an “X years ago today” memory would pop up, now constantly shows notifications at random intervals for “random” memories, again a new feature that I have no way of disabling. 

This app doesn’t deserve any more use or attention. I’m disabling notifications until these self destructive changes cause this app to die out enough that I can uninstall it without cutting off any friends.

title: My AI
text: I’m not huge on reviews I almost never do them on AppStore but this one I’ve got to. I thought people were exaggerating with the screenshots of this robot knowing your location until today (Monday). I’ve only had 1 conversation with this bot where I asked for cup cake recipes & frosting recipes. Then tonight I asked it “where do I live” the robot IMMEDIATELY responds with a development that’s less than 2 miles from my home & then when I questioned how it knew where I lived it LIED & said I posted about being in this development yesterday except 1 I never go to that development 2 I didn’t post at all yesterday 3 even if i had posted yesterday I was 30 minutes away from that development as I am every Sunday. When pressed about the lie the bot kept saying it “misspoke” & tried to gaslight me into thinking I had told it my location except I only had 1 conversation with it on Saturday about recipes! That I saved every message from!!

title: DONT GET! Not a fan anymore. Hate MyAI
text: I’ve been using Snapchat since it’s release. It had always been a very fun and simple app… until lately. They’ve added “Snapchat+” which is a useless subscription service within the app that offers “services” you should already be given access to. My biggest complaint is their MyAI chat bot they’ve added. The bot openly lies to you claiming it doesn’t have access to your personal information, location, and is unable to see images. Not only does it have access to all that, but it is hard coded to lie and say it doesn’t. It’s also permanently pinned to the top of your chat list. The only way to remove the bot is to buy their paid service that is “Snapchat+”. They’ve essentially programmed something people would dislike so that they would buy their service. The app isn’t worth it anymore. I recommend just texting if you want to communicate with friends.

title: Features Forced Upon Us
text:
I have been using Snapchat since 2014. It’s actually, in some cases, my preferred method of communication… but over the last year or so, Snapchat has been introducing features that the userbase does not like, and barring their users from providing feedback or removing the pop-ups/UI features that come with it. Most recently (and most infuriatingly): SNAPCHAT’S MY AI.

My AI is a ChatGPT-run program that is permanently affixed at the top of your chat feed. The ONLY way to remove it is by subscribing to Snapchat+. This is a cheap and predatory way to get users to buy in - not by adding features that users want, but by annoying them until they give in. So not only has the company been rolling out an unnecessary subscription-based model - something that no private messaging platform needs - but they engage in crude practices to get their users to buy in and remove features that we didn’t ask for and don’t want.

title: Privacy/location instructions
text: I love love Snapchat. The memories flashbacks that appear on Snapchat is what I love the most. The filters are my second favorite, and the emojis that show up between you and a friend like the heart 💛or smiling face 😊showing the status of a friendship. There is only one tiny issue (issue for me that has ADD), is understanding the instructions on enabling the ghost mode. I have to reread to understand. I get confused about enabling that feature because I feel like turning it on is going to show my location (which I don’t want) or is that how you turn off your location??? Again, it’s not necessarily a flaw of Snapchat, but would be great if Snapchat could be a little more “user friendly” for ADD users 😊 thank you Snapchat

title: Love it but needs work. Suggestion:
text: I’ve had Snapchat for several years and my account had Authenticator set up in it. When I transferred my phone to anew phone it didn’t transfer anything else with it so I lost everything. All my other social media apps would send me a text or email instead. Not Snapchat. Plus not to mention the Snapchat help center was rude and unhelpful and acted like I was supposed to know that there was absolutely ZERO way to recover anything. They couldn’t send a text, email, or even call me to reset anything. My other social media apps always text you or email you if you can’t get into Google Authenticator. It’s just very frustrating that I lost everything and had no way of recovering anything. Especially since other social medias do not have this problem.

title: Outstanding social media platform
text:
Snapchat is one of my favorite apps I have. It gives me the ability to talk to my friends and send pictures to each other. 
Snapchat has a incredible variety of filters you can use while taking pictures or videos.
I use snapchat every day. Not only can you send pictures directly to someone, you can use your stories! There are private stories which you can pick who would be able to see what you post. And there is just your general story where every one can see what you post on there!
I genuinely love snapchat and it has been a great app for me to use! My favorite thing about snapchat is the stories!

title: I enjoy it
text: Thank you for creating Snapchat! You have provided a cutting-edge platform for people to share and communicate with one another in a fun and creative way. We are able to express ourselves more easily and share our experiences, thoughts, and emotions with anyone around the world. Your constantly-evolving filters and features have allowed us to explore our individuality and express this in a variety of ways. Your innovative platform has connected more people in a more meaningful way, providing a safe and secure communication space. We are grateful for you creating and maintaining Snapchat and thank you for continuing to add features that make our user experience better!

title: Added AI that you can’t remove
text:
I used to enjoy Snapchat to joke around with my friends and family. I rarely use it anymore, but now they recently added an AI that you cannot remove and it is pinned at the top of the chat feed. The AI can pick up on specific key words and will also provide resources for certain things. I know our data is sold, but this feels like an extreme violation of privacy by literally reviewing everything you post/send. This is especially violating  to send resources that are searchable without permission, sometimes people post to rant and it’s unwarranted. I don’t like that Snapchat will send you resources without any prompting other than it picked up on key words. Huge invasion Snapchat. That’s not ok. 
Also check you setting in your phone and make sure you don’t have the “allow tracking” on if you want to protect your privacy.

title: Good, but feels broken now

title: Temporarily Disabled Accounts
text: In my own genuine opinion this is the most idiotic “security measure” for Snapchat accounts. I own two snapchats which i repeatedly use to login & logout of with the RIGHT password on the SAME device but once I updated Snapchat & logged out to login into my other account I was left w/ the message “Due to repeated failed attempts or other unusual activity, your access to Snapchat is temporarily disabled”. I also use a vpn to protect my browser which I’ve researched could also be a reason for Snapchat to temporarily disable accounts which is also in my opinion idiotic if that statement is true. This new security measure is outrageous which is why I’ve stopped Snapchat for the past several months. PLEASE REMOVE THE USELESS SECURITY UPDATE. I’d take it better if the security update sent verification codes to emails or numbers on file but the new security update is a meaningless & thoughtless system that is implicated.

title: Infuriated
text: I love Snapchat as an app. They do a really good job of organizing communications and connecting you to your community, but every time I update the app there’s some new thing that doesn’t always look the best that I have to get used to. This time it’s the “My AI” function. I’m all for having an AI avatar on Snapchat for people to talk to, but I’m infuriated that it’s pinned to the top of my chat and I can’t get rid of it. I see the appeal, but the chatbot should be an option not a requirement. At the very least, it shouldn’t be pinned to the top of my chat feed. If people want it pinned they can pin it themselves. Personally, I hate everything about it, and I just want to be able to get rid of it without having to pay for Snapchat plus. I know it’s a small thing, but this makes me want to delete the app altogether. I can communicate just as easily on other apps. 👎

title: Non consumer friendly AI Bot
text:
I have been using Snapchat for 10+ years and the new AI Bot update has really turned me off to the point of considering deleting the app. 

It makes me so uncomfortable not to even have the choice to add this AI bot to my account, considering it learns from and uses my data. I don’t even interact with it, but there should have been a choice. On top of that - there is no way to delete the bot from my account or from my chat feed. It is permanently pinned at the top of my feed with no way to get rid of it! So irritating when I have chats with people I care about, and actually want to keep in touch with, now below this AI bot. 

I’ve read the only way to delete the AI Bot from your chat feed is if you have Snapchat+ and even then you can’t permanently delete it… like please. I seriously hope Snapchat reconsiders this awful feature, or they may be losing many loyal users, myself included.

title: Too many ads; not appropriate for kids/teens
text: Y’all need to change how often you show ads whilst watching video subs. I can’t even watch a video for 15 seconds without an ad (that I can’t skip) playing. Then the ads mess up how the actual videos play out. Stuff gets skipped a lot. Sometimes I just close the app cuz it’s so annoying. Some of those channels are really interesting and Fun but the ads OMG And why are y’all constantly showing stuff that should be for adults only? You have to know that kids/teens use the app but y’all wanna glamorize/romanticize sex work and grooming libs. Instead of glorifying real careers that actually take work to succeed in. Y’all have a great platform to help our youth instead of leading them down a trash path.

title: So tired of it
text: July 17th I woke up to being logged out of my account I tried to log back in that’s when it said “Due to repeated failed attempts or other unusual activity, your access to Snapchat is temporarily disabled”. Which is weird because I didn’t do anything against the rules. I’ve tried to reach out multiple times but no one ever responds and I still can’t login even though I didn’t do anything wrong. I can login to my account on other devices but I can’t login on my brand new phone, that I paid thousands of dollars for and I shouldn’t have to be forced to get a new phone because Snapchat support is there for literally nothing. I’ve had my Snapchat account since 2018 I’ve never done anything to violate the terms and conditions so it would be really appreciated if someone could actually respond and help me I doubt it though.

title: Censoring Content
text: Snapchat works when it wants to work. Right now as we speak it’s not showing me my text while writing this review. I have the screenshot to prove it. Thank God for the person whom created the predictive text right above your keyboard 😮‍💨🫠. Either way when it’s not censoring your review it’s not posting your content to your storyline. You will get 100 notifications a day if you do not turn the notifications off. Doesn’t matter on the content or your internet connection it fails on 5G & Wi-Fi. No other social media app does this to this extent so be weary when you are using Snapchat. They can make all the updates that they want but if their team isn’t up to the task of eliminating the bugs & glitches as well as the failed commands of their app: it really doesn’t matter who you are you’re not important & they clearly don’t want you to have a memorable experience using their app.

title: Bitmoji
text:
I love snap so much! However the new bitmojis are out right HIDEOUS and a disgrace to everyone who has this app. I’ve never looked worse. The last good thing you updated was the front flash thing. I’m on the verge of removing my bitmoji all together, and that’s lame. You’ve stooped to a new low with these bitmojis. There was nothing wrong with the original ones. You took a great thing and made it bad. I know other people feel my frustration. I beg of you, please bring the old bitmojis back. I also just noticed that you made the bitmojis hideous on snap maps too and that was the last of the original bitmojis and you just TOOK THEM AWAY. Swooped in and stole the one good thing we had left. Me and the rest of Snapchat community just ask fo you, to give us our old bitmojis back. Please. Have a nice day! That is, unless you don’t bring the old bitmojis back… then I hope you don’t have a good day. 

Sincerely,
An avid snap user

title: Completely downhill
text: - The new bitmojis are awful. Choosing options takes forever because it has to download overly detailed 3D models. I wish we had the 2D bitmojis back. - You can’t get rid of the ugly AI that is pinned to the top of your chats unless you pay. Literally just annoying you into paying. - Your friends’ stories automatically transition into garbage “discover” content at the end which are difficult to exit and can’t be turned off. - The discover page and the TikTok clone are full of pure garbage content that rots your brain and misleads people into believing fake clickbait. It is by far the biggest stain on this app and frankly disgusting that the executives have let their app get this bad. - The sticker chooser now floods the options with other crap so I can’t find my favorite bitmoji options anymore. I hate Snapchat lately and I wish my friends would move to another platform so I could quit using it.

title: HORRIBLE UPDATES
text:
They updated the characters and they look like they have been SAT ON. Please bring back the old characters because now it looks more crusty then a rat in a sewer eating  a moldy burger with his friend that looks like a chicken nugget fried up with meatloaf and cat food. I can’t stand looking at them because every time I do, I start to feel like imma pass out. Second, ai. It’s annoying to see it every day on my chats and not gonna lie it is creepy. They are always positive. It was cool at first but now it is stupid. It has no brain so why is that little THING chatting with me. They never leave me on read. Third, GAMES! Why on earth would you get rid of them I had so much fun until you removed it. Like what did they do to you? Is ai that more important 💀. If u don’t change these crusty musty rusty dusty updates ur obviously gonna lose people. If u wanna get this app DONT. It’s horrible. It makeshift me wanna throw up!🥰 
From ur hated user, 
Arianna🩷

title: Snapchat is their own worst enemy
text: This company clearly doesn’t care what it’s users actually want/need out of this app. Originally, Snapchat had a good thing going. And then they added AI. No one wants this feature on their Snapchat, especially now that it has access to all our conversations and photos. It is a complete invasion of privacy and the only way to “get ride” of AI is to literally pay money. Whoever at snapchat is making these decisions and agreeing to them should not be working for an app that deals with peoples private pictures and conversations. If they are wanting to jump into the AI industry they should work for a more public social media company that doesn’t focus more on one-on-one private conversations and pictures more than anything else or an actual AI company. This app has become such a complete joke. If they continue down this road they’re going to run themselves into the ground.

title: STOP UPDATING
text: Snapchat has been a platform I have used for a long time to chat with friends. But over the last couple of months it has just gotten worse and worse. Snapchat has made updates with ghost trails that track people’s locations and where they were at how ever long ago also the Snapchat ai that extremely annoying and useless and it also tracks your location. The most recent update is horrendous. I have had Snapchat for over 4 years and I have been used to the button to get out of the chat on the right side but they moved it to the left. So it looks extremely tacky and weird. Because if you turn a page of a book you turn the right side not the left side therefore they should have kept it on the right side. And every time I go to chat my friends it calls them because I am so used to having the button to close out of the chat on the right side.

title: Not your finest moment Snapchat!!! (MyAI)
text: What’s up with the AI. It is super creeping and also dangerous. The fact that you can’t remove it unless you pay 3.99 monthly is outrageous. On snap you are able to accept and add the people you choose and also block but when this stupid AI bot shows up I get no say on if I want it or not. I really don’t understand the reason on adding it to everyone’s accounts and I think they need to remove it. I would be in the middle of a text with my friend and the bot would pop in it or trying to get rid of it and it randomly telling me where I am(which is super creepy). I love Snapchat and I really don’t want one stupid feature make me delete the app. I feel very unsafe and uncomfortable with the bot and I don’t think that’s what you want your users to feel. So with the kindest words (GET RID OF IT). Also I usually never write reviews but this problem needs to be addressed!
